entry.title: Photos Post 29: Special Events (after 1975), Part 72
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 27 Photos of the special event 1990-1225 Christmas Pūjā, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 27 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 157 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: India 1990-12-22 to 31.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 29: Special Events (after 1975), Part 71
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 32 Photos of the special event 1999-0407 Fifty-second Wedding Anniversary, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 32 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 32 Photos in the smallest gallery: Collection 1999.
The event has as well 6 photos Moments of Joy which can be seen in the smallest gallery at the link Collection Moments of Joy.
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

entry.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, April 2024

link.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, April 2024

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This month 26 new Photos were uploaded to 9 Pūjas as follows (19 high resolutions, 6 medium resolutions, and 1 low resolution).
(i) 1980-011x Pūjā: 1 high resolution and 1 medium uploaded, link India 1980.
(ii) 1981-0114 Makar Saṅkrānti Pūjā: 8 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1982.
(iii) 1981-0321 Birthday Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link Australia 1981.
(iv) 1989-0719 Śhrī Paramachaitanya Pūjā: 1 low resolution uploaded, link Germany 1989.
(v) 1990-0831 Śhrī Hanumāna Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link Germany 1990.
(vi) 1992-0719 Guru Pūjā: 3 medium resolutions uploaded, link Italy 1992.
(vii) 1993-1211 Śhrī Kṛiṣhṇa Pūjā: 1 medium resolution uploaded, link India 1993.
(viii) 1993-1218 Śhrī Gaṇeśha Pūjā: 21medium resolution uploaded, link India 1993.
(ix) 1997-0321 Birthday Pūjā: 8 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1997.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
